description: a(0) = 1, a(1) = 7; for n>=2 a(n) is the number of degree-n monic reducible polynomials over GF(7), i.e. a(n) = 7^n - A001693(n).
comments: Dimensions of homogeneous subspaces of shuffle algebra over 7-letter alphabet (see A058766 for 2-letter case).
references: M. Lothaire, Combinatorics on words, Cambridge mathematical library, 1983, p. 126 (definition of shuffle algebra).
author: Claude Lenormand (claude.lenormand(AT)free.fr), Jan 04 2001
extensions: Better description from Sharon Sela (sharonsela(AT)hotmail.com), Feb 19 2002
